main event: An unidentified object was sighted 3000 feet above the horizon on January 9, 1962, and appeared as a brilliant light burning out before reaching the horizon.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 2140Z,The object was described as a brilliant light,The object was sighted from a military source,The report suggests that the object possibly crashed into the sea after hovering and moving away rapidly,The case was categorized as probably a meteor, however, there was no wreckage found.
